copy_en: Ignoring weight gain can lead to more serious health consequences than most people realize, ${userName}. It's not just about appearance — excess weight, especially around the abdomen, significantly increases your risk of developing diabetes, heart disease, high blood pressure, and even mood disorders like anxiety or depression.

Frequent consumption of processed foods, chemical additives, and chronic stress make it even harder for your body to regulate weight and metabolism, setting off cycles of inflammation and hormonal resistance. The solution needs to be holistic — with real nutrients.

Science shows that even modest, consistent improvements in nutrition and the inclusion of metabolic-activating plants can dramatically lower these risks. The best path is a sustainable, comprehensive one — not crash diets or yo-yo cycles.
